item.title: Apple Says App Store Changes Go Too Far in New Epic Games Appeal Filing
item.description: The court order that required Apple to collect no fees from developers who link to purchases outside of the App Store is unconstitutional, Apple said today in a reply brief directed at Epic Games and

item.title: Fortnite Coming Back to iPhone in Australia After Epic's Legal Victory
item.description: Epic Games has announced that Fortnite will return to iOS in Australia after Apple and Google were found to have broken competition law by banning ‌Epic Games‌ from their app stores. Federal

item.title: Fortnite Coming Back to iPhone in Australia After Epic's Legal Victory
item.description: Epic Games has announced that Fortnite will return to iOS in Australia after Apple and Google were found to have broken competition law by banning ‌Epic Games‌ from their app stores. Federal
